channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLmoneyAndMarkets
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLmoneyAndMarkets, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: I want to gift my grandnieces, ages 5 and 10, stocks. How do I make sure they get an equal amount when they turn 18?
item.description: “One child’s portfolio will have an additional five years of growth.”

item.title: ‘I don’t know how much my wife earns’: I’m 63 with $6.4 million in stocks, mostly Apple. Will I get punished on taxes?
item.description: “Each of our properties are worth over $1 million.”

item.title: ‘He never asks for anything’: I’m 61 with a $1.5 million 401(k). My girlfriend says I do too much for my son, 28. Is she right?
item.description: “I recently gave him $20,000 for a newer car and had him finance the rest.”

item.title: Mysterious UFO at Jeff Bezos’ $165 million Beverly Hills home is probably just a sauna
item.description: Amazon billionaire Jeff Bezos and wife Lauren Sanchez have added an out-of-this-world element to their Beverly Hills mansion: a silver structure that ...

item.title: ‘I would like to give her a head start in life’: My house rose in value by $500K. Do I gift it to my daughter at a bargain price?
item.description: “I would sell it to her for enough to allow me to pay cash for a much smaller condo.”

item.title: Comex Gold, Silver Settle Lower
item.description: Gold settled 1.4% lower, down two of the past three sessions, and silver fell 2.5%, down three of the past four sessions.
